test.name: Open_Application

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |
kw.msg: Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":{"capabilities":{"platformName":"Android","deviceName":"RF8T90V5A7H","appPackage":"com.purplepro.app","appActivity":"com.purplepro.app.MainActivity","automationName":"Uiautomator2","platform":"LINUX","webStorageEnabled":false,"takesScreenshot":true,"javascriptEnabled":true,"databaseEnabled":false,"networkConnectionEnabled":true,"locationContextEnabled":false,"warnings":{},"desired":{"platformName":"Android","deviceName":"RF8T90V5A7H","appPackage":"com.purplepro.app","appActivity":"com.purplepro.app.MainActivity","automationName":"Uiautomator2"},"deviceUDID":"RF8T90V5A7H","pixelRatio":"2.625","statBarHeight":78,"viewportRect":{"left":0,"top":78,"width":1080,"height":2116},"deviceApiLevel":33,"platformVersion":"13","deviceManufacturer":"samsung","deviceModel":"SM-A325F","deviceScreenSize":"1080x2400","deviceScreenDensity":420},"sessionId":"8f087624-8102-4c17-ae4b-02f368a9fe68"}} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'X-Powered-By': 'Express', 'Vary': 'X-HTTP-Method-Override', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Content-Length': '898', 'ETag': 'W/"382-TjHEbrBEJj1MWKCcZE7RM3++ijw"', 'Date': 'Fri, 17 Nov 2023 16:36:20 GMT', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=600'})

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
